amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 203 (Reduced Downpayment Requirement For Loans for Teachers and Uniformed Municipal Employees-CDBG funds) and section 505 (Homeownership for Municipal Employees-HOME Funds) from the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 106-562 to strike section 203 (Reduced Downpayment Requirement For Loans for Teachers and Uniformed Municipal Employees-CDBG funds) and section 505 (Homeownership for Municipal Employees-HOME Funds) from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coburn amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
